title: His Sister's Keeper
description: Tara Roth has needs. To feel safe, she has to know someone else has control. She didn't think she could find that in a good man, someone who was stronger than she was--someone to manage her.But she has no idea how far her stepbrother will go and how far he's wanted to go for a very long time. Warning: This title contains light D/s, double penetration, and anal intercourse.
author: Sinder Stone
